metadata.description: The Eisner Award-winning, surreal superhero series The Flaming Carrot, returns with a new omnibus collection! Check out a comic book series that for many years most people believed to be nothing more than a ridiculous legend or an amusing joke. Doctor recommended. Maximum strength formula. New hope for a nation suffocating in the swill of its own mediocrity. Collects Flaming Carrot #1-#2, #4-#11, #25-#27. Featuring the crossover with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!
metadata.name: Flaming Carrot
